H0.text: Founded in London in 1844 by George Williams, which organisation was established to provide low cost housing in a safe environment. Salvation Army

H1.text: Founded in London in 1844 by George Williams, which organisation was established to provide low cost housing in a safe environment. National Trust

H2.text: Founded in London in 1844 by George Williams, which organisation was established to provide low cost housing in a safe environment. Habitat for Humanity

H3.text: Founded in London in 1844 by George Williams, which organisation was established to provide low cost housing in a safe environment. Ymca

A4.text: The YMCA was founded in 1844 with the purpose of 'the improving of the spiritual condition of young men engaged in the drapery, embroidery, and other trades.'

A5.text: Philanthropists saw them as places for wholesome recreation that would preserve youth from the temptations of alcohol, gambling, and prostitution and that would promote good citizenship.
